{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=BLW-54 |revision=CW3 |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |availability=EoL |fcc_date=01/24/2008 |fcc_id=SJ9-BLW54CW3 |pcb_id=M01-W2504-E10 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 88H20Q1, L835C; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-90G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800A-7TL |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, pinout marked,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 88H20Q1, L835C; |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306SD;RTL8306SD, 87I57S1, G832B TAIWAN; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP14A;SST, 12LP14A;1;InGaP/GaAs;QFN-16;3x3 mm; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=planexuser |default_ssid_regex=^planexuser$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=0000 |oui=00:22:CF |oui_eth=00:22:CF }}
:[http://www.planex.net/product/router/blw-54cw3.htm Product page]
"M01-W2504-E10" and "A12-2085-ET" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[AboCom]]
The power adapter included with the device appears to be a :'''Leader Electronics''' MT12-Y120100-A1 (12V, 1A).
==Images== <gallery> File:Planex BLW-54CW3 board top.jpg|board top File:Planex BLW-54CW3 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
